version.description1: Config version number used for auto_regen_outdated.

auto_regen_outdated.description: Should this file automatically regenerate whenever the default options are changed?

fight_fungus.description1: Should Things attack mobs from Spore: Fungal Infection?
fight_fungus.description2: You may need to modify the config of Spore: Fungal Infection for them to fight correctly

fight_sculk.description1: Should Things attack mobs from Sculk Horde?
fight_sculk.description2: You may need to modify the config of Sculk Horde for them to fight correctly

xeno_allies.description: Gigeresque Xenomorphs do not attack Things
